text: Ke kaloku wabaphakamisela abazali bakhe etroneni, bawa baqubuda phambi kwakhe. Wathi yena: “O tata! Le yintsingiselo yephupha lam langaphambili! INkosi yam Ilenze lazaliseka! Inene Yona Yayisoloko Ilungile kum, ukundikhuphakwaYo entolongweni,Yanizisa apha, Inikhupha kubomi bokuhamba nihlala entlango, emva kokuba uShaytân ehlwayele ubutshaba phakathi kwam nabantakwethu. Inene iNkosi yam InobuBele neMfesane kulowo Imthandileyo. Inene Yona Yiyo Yodwa EnguSolwazi, uSobulumko.”
